          <title>
            <string language="en">Reaction of potassium with water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reaktion des Kaliums mit Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction du potassium avec de l'eau</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This word equation shows the reaction of potassium with water.</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ecuación de la palabra muestra la reacción
